tool_input.command:
ssh hcd2016@192.168.1.144 "cat > ~/start-n8n.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# N8N Docker startup script
# Last updated: $(date)

docker stop n8n 2>/dev/null
docker rm n8n 2>/dev/null

docker run -d \
  --name n8n \
  --restart unless-stopped \
  -p 5680:5678 \
  -e N8N_SECURE_COOKIE=false \
  -e N8N_PROTOCOL=http \
  -e N8N_MCP_SERVER_ENABLED=true \
  -e GENERIC_TIMEZONE=America/Chicago \
  -e TZ=America/Chicago \
  -e WEBHOOK_URL=http://192.168.1.144:5680/ \
  -e N8N_PORT=5678 \
  -e N8N_HOST=0.0.0.0 \
  -e N8N_CORS_ALLOW_ORIGINS=* \
  -v n8n_data:/home/node/.n8n \
  n8nio/n8n:latest

echo 'N8N started on port 5680'
EOF
chmod +x ~/start-n8n.sh && echo 'Saved to ~/start-n8n.sh'"
curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" --max-time 10 https://n8n-hcd.ngrok.dev/healthz

ssh -o ConnectTimeout=5 hcd2016@192.168.1.135 "cat > /tmp/ngrok-n8n.yml << 'EOF'
version: 2
authtoken_from_env: true
tunnels:

tool_input.command: ssh -o ConnectTimeout=5 hcd2016@192.168.1.135 "sudo systemctl stop ngrok-n8n.service; pkill -f 'ngrok.*n8n-hcd' 2>/dev/null; sleep 2; /usr/local/bin/ngrok start n8n --config /tmp/ngrok-n8n.yml &>/tmp/ngrok.log & sleep 5; cat /tmp/ngrok.log | tail -20"

ssh -o ConnectTimeout=10 hcd2016@192.168.1.135 "sudo cp /tmp/ngrok-n8n.yml /etc/ngrok-n8n.yml && sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/ngrok-n8n.service << 'EOF'
[Unit]
Description=Ngrok Tunnel for n8n
After=network.target

[Service]
Type=simple
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/ngrok start n8n --config /etc/ngrok-n8n.yml
Restart=always
RestartSec=10

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF
sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl restart ngrok-n8n.service"
tool_input.description: Update ngrok service with CORS config

ssh -o ConnectTimeout=10 hcd2016@192.168.1.135 "cat > /tmp/ngrok-n8n.yml << 'EOF'
version: 3
agent:
  authtoken_from_env: false
tunnels:
  n8n:
    addr: 5680
    proto: http
    domain: n8n-hcd.ngrok.dev
    traffic_policy:
      on_http_response:
        - actions:
            - type: add-headers
              config:
                headers:
                  Access-Control-Allow-Origin: '*'
                  Access-Control-Allow-Methods: 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS'
                  Access-Control-Allow-Headers: 'X-N8N-API-KEY, Content-Type, Authorization'
EOF
cat /tmp/ngrok-n8n.yml"
